newsitem.title: SYRIA: Pakistani defence chief in Syrian talks.
newsitem.headline: Pakistani defence chief in Syrian talks.

text.p: Syrian Defence Minister Lieutenant-General Mustafa Tlas on Tuesday held talks with the chief-of-staff of Pakistan's armed forces on promoting military cooperation between the two countries, an official spokesman said.
He said that Tlas and Air Marshal Farouq Fayrouz Khan discussed ... "ways of developing ties between the armies of the two friendly countries to serve the interests of peoples of Syria and Pakistan."
The spokesman said the Pakistani military chief, who is heading a high ranking military team, held similar talks earlier with his Syrian counterpart Lieutenant-General Hikmat Shihabi.
